Name: 2nd Taurian Lancers
Details: The Second Taurian Lancers is a multiregiment combined-arms formation fielded by the Taurian Concordat formed in 3042.  Building on tactical doctrine proven by the success of the First Taurian Lancer, the Second are a regiment of light to medium weight 'Mechs had been assembled and paired with a regiment of heavy and assault weight tanks (Heavy LRM Carriers).
